breakpoints.label: Breakpoints
breakpoints.comment: Assign number of items in a row to specific viewport width. in default: '[0, 1], [320, 2], [480, 3], [768, 4], [960, 5], [1280, 6]'

show_items.label: Show Items Number
show_items.comment: Number of items in a row displayed if responsive mode is off. Value in etc. from 1 to 100

aspect_ratio.label: Keep Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.comment: if Yes, you may set Width image only

move.label: Move
move.comment: Number of items that should move on scrolling. From 1 to 10

timeout.label: Timeout
timeout.comment: Slider timeout. Set to enable automatic scrolling. Value in milliseconds.

speed.label: Scrolling Speed
speed.comment: Speed (arrows / touch swipe). in milliseconds from 0 to 100000

auto_speed.label: Auto Scrolling Speed
auto_speed.comment: Speed (automatic scrolling / pagination). in milliseconds from 0 to 100000

lazy.label: Lazy Image Loading
lazy.comment: Load image only if need to show it to user

hotcategories_outer_bg_color.label: Outer Background Color
hotcategories_outer_bg_color.comment: Background color of the web browser viewport (applied for HTML body element). Set the same color as for footer background to avoid blank space below the footer on large screens.

hotcategories_inner_bg_color.label: Inner Background Color
hotcategories_inner_bg_color.comment: Background color of the web browser viewport (applied for HTML body element). Set the same color as for footer background to avoid blank space below the footer on large screens.

blog_outer_bg_color.label: Outer Background Color
blog_outer_bg_color.comment: Background color of the web browser viewport (applied for HTML body element). Set the same color as for footer background to avoid blank space below the footer on large screens.

blog_inner_bg_color.label: Inner Background Color
blog_inner_bg_color.comment: Background color of the web browser viewport (applied for HTML body element). Set the same color as for footer background to avoid blank space below the footer on large screens.

labels_font_size.label: Labels Font Size on Product Sliders
labels_font_size.comment: Value in pixels. From 1 to 50 px

price_slider_color_background.label: Price Slider Element Outer Selection Line Color

price_slider_color_active.label: Price Slider Element Inner Selection Line Color

labels_font_size_grid.label: Labels Font Size (Grid View)
labels_font_size_grid.comment: Value in pixels. From 1 to 50 px

labels_font_size_list.label: Labels Font Size (List View)
labels_font_size_list.comment: Value in pixels. From 1 to 50 px

labels_font_size.label: Labels Font Size
labels_font_size.comment: Value in pixels. From 1 to 50 px

viewed_breakpoints.label: Breakpoints
viewed_breakpoints.comment:
With this parameter you can specify the number of products in a row visible with a particular browser viewport width. Use the following format (this is the default value):
[0, 1], [320, 2], [480, 3], [960, 4], [1280, 5]
More details about this parameter can be found in the user guide.
Leave empty to use the default value.

viewed_timeout.label: Timeout
viewed_timeout.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the slider, specify time (in milliseconds) between transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.
